title: [Large-scale] Attendance-based Mathematics Learning Achievement Improvement Program Using Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Knowledge and Higher Education Experience
context.additional_context: An environment requiring the development of a balanced model between flexible learning needs and attendance rates for graduate students aged 40+. Enables real-time interaction and self-directed access to learning materials via VR simulations.

learning_goals: Learners accurately explain the correlation between attendance rates and academic achievement at over 80% accuracy using learning analytics data.
Learners achieve over 90% participation in VR-based simulation activities to enhance concept application skills.
Learners analyze individual learning patterns via weekly formative assessments and improve goal achievement rates by at least 75%.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
